### Process Improvement Suggestions

**For Future Scout-and-Plan Runs**:
1. Check for image conversion tools early and recommend sharp for Node projects
2. Include image dimensions in plan (was done - very helpful)
3. Note potential file extension mismatches (PNG files with JPEG data)

**For Future Build Runs**:
1. sharp package approach is cleaner than system-level cwebp
2. Consider creating reusable image conversion script for future use
3. Quality 80 for photos, 90 for logos was appropriate

**For Future Test-and-Cleanup Runs**:
1. WebP accessibility check via curl is effective validation
2. Verify lazy loading presence on correct images (below-fold only)

**For Overall Workflow**:
1. Consider adding vite-imagetools plugin for automatic WebP on new images
2. Sharp should be recommended default for image optimization in Node projects
3. Clean handoff between agents - no issues found during validation
